channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Sam Smith @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-02-18 04:00 — Sam Smith at The Castro Theatre. Sam Smith's 'To Be Free' tour is a highly anticipated event, showcasing his powerful vocals and emotional performances.

item.title: BENEE @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-03-01 04:00 — BENEE at The Fillmore. BENEE is gaining traction with her unique pop sound and engaging live performances, making her show a must-see.

item.title: Cat Power @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-02-19 04:00 — Cat Power at Fox Theater - Oakland. Cat Power's 'The Greatest Tour' promises an intimate experience with her soulful music and storytelling.

item.title: Snow Strippers @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-02-22 04:00 — Snow Strippers at Fox Theater - Oakland. Snow Strippers brings an intriguing mix of genres, appealing to fans of eclectic sounds.

item.title: Joseph @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-03-01 04:30 — Joseph at August Hall. Joseph's harmonies and heartfelt lyrics create a powerful live experience that resonates with audiences.

item.title: Dave @ Fox Theater - Oakland
item.description: 2026-04-01 03:00 — Dave at Fox Theater - Oakland. Dave's 'The Boy Who Played the Harp Tour' is set to deliver a captivating performance, showcasing his lyrical prowess.

item.title: Van Morrison @ Palace of Fine Arts
item.description: 2026-02-19 03:00 → 2026-02-20 03:00 — Van Morrison at Palace of Fine Arts. Brandi Carlile's powerful voice and storytelling ability make her concerts a memorable experience.

item.title: Excision @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-03-14 02:00 → 2026-03-14 02:00 — Excision at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Indigo De Souza's raw and emotional performances resonate with fans of indie rock.

item.title: Lewis Capaldi @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-05-04 02:00 — Lewis Capaldi at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Machine Girl's energetic performances and genre-blending style make for an exciting live show.

item.title: ZZ Ward @ Uptown Theatre Napa
item.description: 2026-02-26 04:00 — ZZ Ward at Uptown Theatre Napa. The Midnight's nostalgic sound and engaging performances attract a dedicated fanbase.

item.title: Romare @ Monarch
item.description: 2026-02-21 06:00 — Romare at Monarch. The Polish Ambassador's unique sound and engaging performances attract a dedicated following.

item.title: Del Water Gap @ The Masonic
item.description: 2026-02-16 04:00 — Del Water Gap at The Masonic. Nine Inch Nails' reputation for powerful live performances makes this show a must-see.

item.title: Chris Isaak @ Uptown Theatre Napa
item.description: 2026-02-27 04:00 — Chris Isaak at Uptown Theatre Napa. Chris Isaak's smooth voice and engaging stage presence make his shows a classic experience.
